definition[0]: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct
example[1]: It was difficult to get precise information.
example[2]: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise.’
definition[1]: used to emphasize that you are referring to an exact thing
example[3]: At that precise moment, her husband walked in.
example[4]: The precise cause of the disease is unknown.
example[5]: the precise location of the ship
example[6]: the precise nature of their agreement
definition[2]: someone who is precise is very careful about small details or about the way they behave
example[8]: with precise movements of his hands
